original_title: ノロイノドウガ 怖すぎる心霊動画集~怨編~
overview: The spirit also has a will (curse). There is a reason why he appeared there. Resentment, envy, sadness, sorrow, etc. The grudge hidden in the shadow of everyday life is projected on the camera. It highlights the will of the spirit through what happened there.
tagline: Unraveling the background (curse) of the spirit.
title: Noroi no Douga: Too Scary Psychic Video Collection - Grudge Edition
